detailed_findings.title: 8 Cool Winter Sweater Trends to Wear in 2026 | Who What Wear
detailed_findings.summary: Feeling like last year's sweaters need an update, the author looked to stylish women in NYC, London, and the Netherlands for winter 2025 knitwear inspiration. Key trends include cinched cardigans, high V-necks, Fair Isle prints, argyle knits, and scarf sweaters, styled with dark denim, barrel-leg jeans, or column skirts. The J.Crew Rollneck is an editor favorite. The article also highlights various outfit formulas using these trends and promotes shopping for new sweaters from retailers like Zara, J.Crew, and Toteme.
detailed_findings.content_snippet: I spent the morning unpacking my sweater collection from storage. Cashmeres and wools, slim knits, chunky cardigans… I know winter is just around the corner when these woven beauties make an appearance. One problem: These sweaters feel so last year. Looking to update mywinter sweater selection, I've turned to the cool girls of NYC, London, and the Netherlands forwinter outfit inspiration. Below you'll find some of the chicest, non-boringsweater trends of winter 2025. Think cinched cardigans, high V-necks, Fair Isle prints,argyle knits,scarf sweaters, and so much more. (Shout-out to theJ.Crew Rollneckfor being an editor-favorite sweater this season.) I recommend styling these knits with a pair ofdark-rinse denim, barrel-leg jeans, or acolumn skirtto showcase these woven pieces fully. Scroll on to shop the cool sweater trends ahead ofwinter 2026, loved by cool girls from NYC to London. Shop Cool Winter Sweater Trends Get the look:High V-neck + pleated skirt + pointed-toe kitten heels Get

detailed_findings.title: 8 Top Sweaters Trends for Women Fall/Winter 2025
detailed_findings.summary: Harper's BAZAAR editors have curated a list of nine top sweater trends for fall 2025, focusing on transitional dressing and investment-worthy knitwear. Key trends include argyle, boho cardigans, zip-up cable knits, cashmere wraps, nautical knits, scarf-neck sweaters, and cut-away vests. The focus is on lighter-weight layers for early fall and versatile pieces that can be styled in various ways. The selections include specific product recommendations. The page also includes links to various other content, including Black Friday deals and beauty and fashion content.
detailed_findings.content_snippet: Every product on this page was chosen by a Harper's BAZAAR editor. We may earn commission on some of the items you choose to buy. It’s time to turn your attention tofall—or at least to the art oftransitional dressing. Shopping early is the key to securing the best new styles before they inevitably sell out, especially in knitwear. To help you beat the rush, we’ve shortlisted nine top sweater trends to invest in this autumn, inspired by our feeds andstandout street stylewe’ve spotted lately. From argyle pullovers and bohocardigansto zip-upcable-knitsand cashmere wraps, theseinvestment-worthy knitspromise to anchor your closet in the months ahead and for years to come. Before reaching for heavywool turtlenecks, stock your early fall wardrobe with lighter-weight layers. Knit tees and short-sleeved cardigans will help keep your favorite skirts and dresses in rotation a little longer. One standout detail in this season’s trending knits? Zippers. detailed_findings.title: 10 Winter Knitwear Trends for 2025, from Sheers to Sets
detailed_findings.summary: This article forecasts winter 2025 knitwear trends, highlighting half-zip sweaters, high-neck button/tie-front cardigans, knits with built-in scarves, and brightly colored cardigans. Experts from Nordstrom, Anthropologie, and a NYC stylist offer styling tips and examples. Note: The article may receive compensation for clicks on provided links.
detailed_findings.content_snippet: If you click on links we provide, we may receive compensation. 10 Winter Knitwear Trends Taking Over in 2025, from Sheers to Matching Sets The coldest and coziest season is upon us and you know what that means: There’s no time like the present to stock up oncoats, boots, and the all-important sweaters for the weeks and months ahead. While we firmly believe that you should wear whatever strikes your fancy, there’s no denying that, some woven silhouettes outrank others depending on the year, and this season is full of fresh takes on practical staples as well as arguments for knitwear maximalism. With that in mind,we chatted with three style experts to uncover the most popular winter knitwear trends for 2025—see them all ahead, including nine inspired sweater options and one mega-viral accessory. detailed_findings.title: 18 Best Sweaters for Fall and Winter 2025, According to Editors
detailed_findings.summary: Town & Country editors share their favorite sweater picks for fall in "The Weekly Covet".  The collection features a variety of styles and materials including cashmere, cotton, alpaca and merino wool.  Editors highlight the versatility, comfort, and stylish details of each pick, covering cardigans, pullovers, turtlenecks, and unique knit wraps.
detailed_findings.content_snippet: Every item on this page was chosen by aTown & Countryeditor. We may earn commission on some of the items you choose to buy. Once a week, we ask our editors to share the items they've been loving or lusting after—whether it's anew skincare productwe're dying to try ora travel essentialwe can't live without. Consider "The Weekly Covet" your editor-approved wish list for beauty, travel, fashion, and everything in between. detailed_findings.title: The Top 4 Sweater Trends to Try in 2025 - PureWow
detailed_findings.summary:
PureWow editors highlight sweater trends for Fall/Winter 2025:

*   **In:** Chanel-inspired jackets, Half-zip sweaters, Fair Isle sweaters, Cardigans (especially thin crewneck styles, buttoned up as shirts).
*   **Out (for now):** Off-the-shoulder sweaters.
detailed_findings.content_snippet: 4 Sweater Trends to Buy and Wear ASAP (& 1 to Keep in Storage This Year) PureWow editors select every item that appears on this page, and some items may be gifted to us. Additionally, PureWow may earn compensation through affiliate links within the story. All prices are accurate upon date of publish.You can learn more about the affiliate process here. Sweater weatheris officially upon us, and with it comes an array of new sweater trends to snuggle into as temperatures continue to drop. True, you’ll never go wrong with aclassic cashmere pulloveror timeless polo collar, but there are some styles that feel much trendier and fresher than others and are sure to make you stand out from the sea of comfy knits. So, without further ado, here are the top four sweater trends I’m obsessing over for fall/winter 2025, plus one style you can keep in storage for now. Are Suede Jackets Worth the Investment? Here's My Honest Review of Two Suede Coats That People Constantly Ask, “Where Did You Get That?”
